channel.title: Kaspersky and ZA
channel.description:
Iam wondering if Zonealarm secuirty suite and Kaspersky Antivirus will work together??
~fight fest[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 12:13:36 PM[/size][hr]Does anyone know if this works?? Please help

item.title: Kaspersky and ZA
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:5, topic:38964”][quote author=leader link=topic=54788.msg680787#msg680787 date=1167025119]
I use them both. They work perfectly for me.
[/quote]
ZA hates my other comp then lol. My dad tried for like 2 hours, and ZA kept saying,
“Not Functional! Turn off other firewall(s)!”

Maybe you’re using a newer version. ;)[/quote]

Well, I only use the Kaspersky Antivirus not the Firewall. I got the Kaspersky Antivirus because it came with System Mechanic. I removed the Kaspersky firewall because ZoneAlarm was one, but instead of using the Suite version of ZoneAlarm I bought Pro, because the Suite Version kept freezing when I ran the Antivirus. That is why I use both Kaspersky and ZoneAlarm. Fight fest wasn’t talking about two Firewalls, he was talking about a Firewall and Antivirus.

fight fest:

I am wondering if Zonealarm secuirty suite and Kaspersky Antivirus will work together?

Read full topic

item.title: Kaspersky and ZA
item.dc:creator: @fight_fest fight fest
item.description:
@fight_fest wrote:

Ok thank you very much Ron, I wont try it then I just didnt want to fuck up my firewall, Ive already had a Trojan…

Read full topic

item.title: Kaspersky and ZA
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Probably not cause I remember when I had Norton, and when I tried to install it, it said, sorry we can’t install it unless you remove Spybot.

Then I was like fuck that and I got kaspersky.

I bet you any money, kaspersky won’t care if ZA is installed, but if ZA is installed first and you try to install Kaspersky, ZA will be like dicks and prompt you saying YOU CAN ONLY HAVE 1 FIREWALL.

They all say that by using the excuse that the firewalls will conflict with each other. That is true, but the way they make it seem, it’s like If you have more than 1 firewall running then your firewall won’t work properly. But that’s bullshit. :rolleyes:

Don’t try it, ZA is going to have problems.

Read full topic
